overview:
Passionate about Dutch design, we are always on the lookout for new contemporary lighting and funky home accessories that are not available anywhere else!
We were the first to introduce many new designs to the UK, including Tord Boontjeâ€™s Midsummer and Icarus light and designs from up-and-coming designers.

Our range includes: contemporary lighting, funky home accessories, chandeliers, pendant lights, table lights, furniture, clocks, mirrors and designer tableware Browse our gift ideas section to get inspiration for the perfect gift.
